QuestData.Title: The Master Planner
QuestData.Description: All forge camps have a master planner. The master planner dictates what types of structures are present at a forge camp and how each structure is situated. Moreover, this information is kept on a set of blueprints that the planner carries around on their person.$B$BWe need the master planner's blueprints. Armed with such exacting information, we could persuade an acquaintance of mine to lend some assistance.$B$BFind the mo'arg master planner and take his blueprints. He will be stationed behind the forges.
QuestData.LogDescription: Altruis the Sufferer in western Nagrand has asked that you recover the Master Planner's Blueprints.
QuestData.CompletionText: Avoid the overseers at all costs. They must not be let on to your presence. The results could be disastrous!
QuestData.RewardText: My acquaintance will hopefully know of a way to destroy the camps. He was a Legion engineer, after all...
